analyzed: bod skad du /

original: rang bzhin gsum nges par bstan pa /
analyzed: rang bzhin gsum nges par bstan pa /

original: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la 'tshal lo //🔽brtags dang gzhan gyi dbang dang ni //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la 'tshal lo // brtags dang gzhan gyi dbang dang ni //
translated: Homage to the Blessed Lord of the World🔽The imagined, the dependent,

original: yongs su grub pa nyid dag ste //
analyzed: yongs su grub pa nyid dag ste //

original: rang bzhin gsum po brtan rnams kyi /
analyzed: rang bzhin gsum po brtan rnams kyi /

original: zab mo yi ni shes byar 'dod //
analyzed: zab mo yi ni shes byar 'dod //
translated: They are considered to be the profound objects of knowledge.🔽Because they function through the power of conditions

analyzed: rkyen gyi dbang gis 'jug pa dang // brtags pa tsam gyi dngos yin pas // gang zhig snang de gzhan dbang ste //
translated: And are entities that are mere imputations,🔽Whatever appears is the dependent nature.🔽Whatever appears is the imagined nature.🔽Whatever appears is the dependent nature.

analyzed: ji snang de kun brtags pa yin // gang snang de yi ji ltar snang //

analyzed: rtag tu med pa gang yin de // gzhan du 'gyur med ces bya bas //
translated: Whatever appears is the imagined nature.🔽Whatever appears is the dependent nature.🔽Whatever appears is the imagined nature.🔽Whatever appears is the dependent nature.🔽Whatever appears is the imagined nature.🔽Whatever appears is the dependent nature.🔽Whatever appears is the imagined nature.🔽Whatever appears is the dependent nature.🔽Whatever appears is the imagined nature.🔽Whatever appears is the dependent nature.🔽Whatever appears is the imagined nature.🔽Whatever appears is the dependent nature.🔽Whatever appears is the imagined nature.🔽Whatever appears is the dependent nature.🔽Whatever appears is the imagined nature.🔽Whatever appears is the dependent nature.🔽Whatever appears is the imagined nature.🔽Whatever appears is the dependent nature.🔽Whatever appears is the imagined nature.🔽Whatever appears is the dependent nature.

original: yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin yin //🔽de dag gang snang kun brtags te //
analyzed: yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin yin // de dag gang snang kun brtags te //
translated: Whatever appears is the imagined nature.🔽Whatever appears is the dependent nature.🔽Whatever appears is the imagined nature.🔽Whatever appears is the dependent nature.

original: ji ltar snang de gnyis po'o //🔽de la de med gang yin pa //
analyzed: ji ltar snang de gnyis po'o // de la de med gang yin pa //
translated: Whatever appears is the imagined nature.🔽Whatever appears is the dependent nature.🔽Whatever appears is the imagined nature.🔽Whatever appears is the dependent nature.

original: de nyid de yi gnyis med chos //
analyzed: de nyid de yi gnyis med chos //
translated: Whatever appears is the imagined nature.🔽Whatever appears is the dependent nature.

original: gang phyir de la med brtags dang // de yi ji ltar don brtags pa //
analyzed: gang phyir de la med brtags dang // de yi ji ltar don brtags pa //
translated: Because it is imagined to be nonexistent in that, and because it is imagined to be the object in that,

original: de ltar shin tu med pas na//
analyzed: de ltar shin tu med pas na//
translated: it is thus completely nonexistent.

original: sems ni kun rtogs zhes bya yin //
analyzed: sems ni kun rtogs zhes bya yin //
translated: Therefore, mind is called imagination.🔽It is asserted that mind is twofold

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yis //🔽sems de rnam pa gnyis 'dod do //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yis // sems de rnam pa gnyis 'dod do //
translated: by the nature of cause and effect.🔽The so-called foundation consciousness

original: kun gzhi rnam shes zhes bya dang // 'jug pa zhes bya rnam bdun no //
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam shes zhes bya dang // 'jug pa zhes bya rnam bdun no //
translated: and the so-called active consciousnesses are seven.

original: dang po kun nyon mongs sa bon //
analyzed: dang po kun nyon mongs sa bon //
translated: The first is the seed of the thoroughly afflicted

original: bag chags bsags pas sems zhes bya //🔽gnyis pa rnam pa sna tshogs su //
analyzed: bag chags bsags pas sems zhes bya // gnyis pa rnam pa sna tshogs su //
translated: and is called mind because it accumulates latent propensities.🔽The second is called active consciousness

original: rab tu 'jug pas brjod pa yin //
analyzed: rab tu 'jug pas brjod pa yin //
translated: because it engages in various aspects.

original: yang dag ma yin kun rtog de //🔽rnam par smin dang de bzhin du //🔽dar 'dzin gzhan du snang ba yi //
analyzed: yang dag ma yin kun rtog de // rnam par smin dang de bzhin du // dar 'dzin gzhan du snang ba yi //
translated: That imagination of what is unreal

original: dbye bas rnam pa gsum du'ang 'dod //
analyzed: dbye bas rnam pa gsum du'ang 'dod //
translated: is asserted to be threefold by its classification🔽as the fruitional, the apprehending subject,🔽and the appearing object.

original: dang po rnam smin bdag nyid de //
analyzed: dang po rnam smin bdag nyid de //
translated: The first is the nature of the fruitional,

original: 'di ni rtsa ba'i rnam shes yin //
analyzed: 'di ni rtsa ba'i rnam shes yin //
translated: and this is the fundamental consciousness.

original: gzhan @10b ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes //
analyzed: gzhan @10b ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes //
translated: The others are the active consciousnesses.

original: blta bya mthong byed rtog pas 'jug / yod dang med pa gnyis dang gcig / kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dag / mtshan nyid kyis ni rab dbye bas //
analyzed: blta bya mthong byed rtog pas 'jug / yod dang med pa gnyis dang gcig / kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dag / mtshan nyid kyis ni rab dbye bas //
translated: The dependent is the nature of the sign,🔽And the perfected is the nature of nonimputation.

original: rang bzhin dag ni zab par 'dod //
analyzed: rang bzhin dag ni zab par 'dod //
translated: The imagined is the nature of the object,🔽The dependent is the nature of the subject,🔽And the perfected is the nature of their nonexistence.

original: yod par bzung ba gang yin pa //
analyzed: yod par bzung ba gang yin pa //
translated: The imagined is the nature of the object,🔽The dependent is the nature of the subject,

original: de nyid shin tu med pa ste //
analyzed: de nyid shin tu med pa ste //
translated: And the perfected is the nature of their nonexistence.

original: des na brtags pa'i rang bzhin te //🔽yod dang med pa'i mtshan nyid 'dod //
analyzed: des na brtags pa'i rang bzhin te // yod dang med pa'i mtshan nyid 'dod //
translated: The imagined is the nature of the object,🔽The dependent is the nature of the subject,🔽And the perfected is the nature of their nonexistence.🔽The imagined is the nature of the object,🔽The dependent is the nature of the subject,🔽And the perfected is the nature of their nonexistence.

original: 'khrul pa'i ngo bor yod pa dang // ji ltar snang bzhin med pa ste //🔽des na gzhan gyi dbang de yang //🔽yod dang med pa'i mtshan nyid 'dod //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i ngo bor yod pa dang // ji ltar snang bzhin med pa ste // des na gzhan gyi dbang de yang // yod dang med pa'i mtshan nyid 'dod //
translated: The imagined is the nature of the object,🔽The dependent is the nature of the subject,🔽And the perfected is the nature of their nonexistence.🔽The imagined is the nature of the object,🔽The dependent is the nature of the subject,🔽And the perfected is the nature of their nonexistence.

original: gang phyir gnyis po med pa dang // gnyis su med par yod pa ste //
analyzed: gang phyir gnyis po med pa dang // gnyis su med par yod pa ste //
translated: The imagined is the nature of the object,🔽The dependent is the nature of the subject,

original: des na yongs su grub rang bzhin //
analyzed: des na yongs su grub rang bzhin //
translated: And the perfected is the nature of their nonexistence.🔽The imagined is the nature of the object,🔽The dependent is the nature of the subject,🔽And the perfected is the nature of their nonexistence.

original: yod dang med pa'i mtshan nyid 'dod //
analyzed: yod dang med pa'i mtshan nyid 'dod //
translated: The imagined is the nature of the object,🔽The dependent is the nature of the subject,🔽And the perfected is the nature of their nonexistence.🔽The imagined is the nature of the object,🔽The dependent is the nature of the subject,🔽And the perfected is the nature of their nonexistence.🔽The imagined is the nature of the object,🔽The dependent is the nature of the subject,🔽And the perfected is the nature of their nonexistence.🔽The imagined is the nature of the object,🔽The dependent is the nature of the subject,🔽And the perfected is the nature of their nonexistence.

original: brtag pa'i don gyi rnam gnyis te //
analyzed: brtag pa'i don gyi rnam gnyis te //
translated: The imagined is the nature of the object,🔽The dependent is the nature of the subject,🔽And the perfected is the nature of their nonexistence.

original: yod dang med pa ngo bor gcig / des na byis pa brtags rang bzhin //
analyzed: yod dang med pa ngo bor gcig / des na byis pa brtags rang bzhin //
translated: The imagined is the nature of the object,🔽The dependent is the nature

original: gnyis dang gcig gi bdag nyid 'dod //
analyzed: gnyis dang gcig gi bdag nyid 'dod //
translated: The dependent nature is accepted as having a twofold and a unitary nature.

original: snang ba'i cha yi gnyis yin la //
analyzed: snang ba'i cha yi gnyis yin la //
translated: The twofold aspect is the apparent aspect,🔽And the unitary aspect is the mere delusion.

original: 'khrul ba tsam dngos gcig yin pas //🔽gzhan dbang zhes bya'i rang bzhin yang //🔽gnyis dang gcig gi bdag nyid 'dod //
analyzed: 'khrul ba tsam dngos gcig yin pas // gzhan dbang zhes bya'i rang bzhin yang // gnyis dang gcig gi bdag nyid 'dod //
translated: Therefore, the dependent nature is accepted as having a twofold and a unitary nature.🔽The perfected nature is accepted as having a twofold and a unitary nature.🔽The perfected nature is accepted as having a twofold and a unitary nature.

original: gnyis kyi ngo bo'i rang bzhin nyid //🔽gnyis su med par gcig gyur pas /
analyzed: gnyis kyi ngo bo'i rang bzhin nyid // gnyis su med par gcig gyur pas /
translated: The perfected nature is accepted as having a twofold and a unitary nature.🔽The imputed and the dependent🔽Are characterized by the afflictions and the objects of knowledge.

original: yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin yang //
analyzed: yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin yang //
translated: The perfected is accepted as having the character of purification.🔽The imputed and the dependent are unreal,🔽And the perfected is accepted as being real.🔽The imputed nature is not the perfected nature,🔽And the dependent is not the perfected nature.🔽The perfected nature is accepted as having a twofold and a unitary nature.

original: gnyis dang gcig gi bdag nyid 'dod //
analyzed: gnyis dang gcig gi bdag nyid 'dod //
translated: The imputed and the dependent🔽Are characterized by the afflictions and the objects of knowledge.🔽The perfected is accepted as having the character of purification.

original: brtags dang gzhan gyi dbang dag ni //
analyzed: brtags dang gzhan gyi dbang dag ni //
translated: The imputed and the dependent are unreal,🔽And the perfected is accepted as being real.🔽The imputed nature is not the perfected nature,🔽And the dependent is not the perfected nature.🔽The perfected nature is accepted as having a twofold and a unitary nature.🔽The perfected nature is accepted as having a twofold and a unitary nature.🔽The perfected nature is accepted as having a twofold and a unitary nature.🔽The imputed and the dependent🔽Are characterized by the afflictions and the objects of knowledge.

original: shes bya kun nyon mongs mtshan nyid //
analyzed: shes bya kun nyon mongs mtshan nyid //
translated: The perfected is accepted as having the character of purification.🔽The imputed and the dependent are unreal,🔽And the perfected is accepted as being real.

original: yongs su grub pa rnam byang gi / mtshan nyid du ni 'dod pa yin //🔽mi bden gnyis po'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: yongs su grub pa rnam byang gi / mtshan nyid du ni 'dod pa yin // mi bden gnyis po'i rang bzhin te //
translated: The imputed nature is not the perfected nature,🔽And the dependent is not the perfected nature.🔽The perfected nature is accepted as having a twofold and a unitary nature.🔽The perfected nature is accepted as having a twofold and a unitary nature.

original: dngos med rang bzhin nyid yin pas //
analyzed: dngos med rang bzhin nyid yin pas //
translated: The perfected nature is accepted as having a twofold and a unitary nature.🔽The imputed and the dependent🔽Are characterized by the afflictions and the objects of knowledge.

original: brtags pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya las //
analyzed: brtags pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya las //
translated: The perfected is accepted as having the character of purification.

original: grub pa'i mtshan nyid gzhan ma yin //🔽gnyis med pa yi rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtshan nyid gzhan ma yin // gnyis med pa yi rang bzhin nyid //
translated: The imputed and the dependent are unreal,🔽And the perfected is accepted as being real.🔽The imputed nature is not the perfected nature,🔽And the dependent is not the perfected nature.🔽The perfected nature is accepted as having a twofold and a unitary nature.

original: gnyis pos med pa'i rang bzhin pas //
analyzed: gnyis pos med pa'i rang bzhin pas //
translated: The perfected nature is accepted as having a twofold and a unitary nature.🔽The

original: yongs su grub las brtags pa yi //🔽mtshan nyid gzhan min shes par bya //
analyzed: yongs su grub las brtags pa yi // mtshan nyid gzhan min shes par bya //
translated: The imagined nature should be understood as not being different from the perfected nature.

original: bden min ji ltar snang gyur pa //
analyzed: bden min ji ltar snang gyur pa //
translated: The dependent nature is not real, but it is not nonexistent either,

original: de ltar med pa'i rang bzhin pas //🔽gzhan dbang zhes bya'i rang bzhin las //
analyzed: de ltar med pa'i rang bzhin pas // gzhan dbang zhes bya'i rang bzhin las //
translated: because it is the nature of things to appear in a way that does not correspond to their mode of existence.

original: yongs grub mtshan nyid tha dad min //
analyzed: yongs grub mtshan nyid tha dad min //
translated: The perfected nature is not different from the dependent nature,🔽which is called the “nature of things.”

original: yang dag min pa gnyis rang bzhin //
analyzed: yang dag min pa gnyis rang bzhin //
translated: The dependent nature is the nature of things that is not real,

original: ji ltar snang ba'i dngos med pas //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i dngos med pas //
translated: because it is the nature of things to appear in a way that does not correspond to their mode of existence.

original: yongs grub las kyang gzhan dbang ge / mtshan nyid tha dad min zhes bya //
analyzed: yongs grub las kyang gzhan dbang ge / mtshan nyid tha dad min zhes bya //
translated: The perfected nature is not different from the dependent nature,

original: tha snyad @11a * //🔽la ni ltos pa yi //🔽rang bzhin dbye ba'i go rims dang // de la 'jug pa'i dbang byas pa'i //
analyzed: tha snyad @11a * // la ni ltos pa yi // rang bzhin dbye ba'i go rims dang // de la 'jug pa'i dbang byas pa'i //
translated: which is called the “nature of things.”🔽The order of the divisions of the nature of things is presented in accordance with the order in which they are realized,

original: rtogs pa'i rim pa bzhin du brjod //🔽kun brtags tha snyad bdag nyid de //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i rim pa bzhin du brjod // kun brtags tha snyad bdag nyid de //
translated: which is based on the order in which they are engaged.🔽The imagined nature is the nature of things that is conventional.

original: tha snyad 'dogs pa gzhan bdag nyid //
analyzed: tha snyad 'dogs pa gzhan bdag nyid //
translated: The dependent nature is the nature of things that is the basis of the conventional.🔽The perfected nature is the nature of things that is the cessation of the conventional.🔽The order of the divisions of the nature of things is presented in accordance with the order in which they are realized,

original: tha snyad yongs su chad pa yi //
analyzed: tha snyad yongs su chad pa yi //
translated: which is based on the order in which they are engaged.

original: rang bzhin yang ni gzhan du 'dod //🔽sngon du gnyis po bdag med la //
analyzed: rang bzhin yang ni gzhan du 'dod //🔽sngon du gnyis po bdag med la //
translated: The imagined nature is the nature of things that is conventional.🔽The dependent nature is the nature of things that is the basis of the conventional.🔽The perfected nature is the nature of things that is the cessation of the conventional.

original: zhugs pas gzhan dbang la 'jug ste //
analyzed: zhugs pas gzhan dbang la 'jug ste //
translated: One engages in the consummate.🔽The two do not exist there,

original: yod pa ma yin gnyis po dag / de la rtags tsam yin phyir ro //🔽de nas gnyis dngos med rang bzhin //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin gnyis po dag / de la rtags tsam yin phyir ro // de nas gnyis dngos med rang bzhin //
translated: Because they are mere imputations.🔽Then, one engages in the consummate,

original: yongs grub la ni 'dir 'jug ste //
analyzed: yongs grub la ni 'dir 'jug ste //
translated: Which has the nature of the nonexistence of the two.

original: 'di ltar de nyid de yi tshe //
analyzed: 'di ltar de nyid de yi tshe //
translated: At that time,

original: yod dang med pa dag tu'ang brjod //
analyzed: yod dang med pa dag tu'ang brjod //
translated: It is said to be both existent and nonexistent.

original: rang bzhin gsum po de dag ni //
analyzed: rang bzhin gsum po de dag ni //
translated: These three natures

original: dmigs med gnyis med mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: dmigs med gnyis med mtshan nyid de //
translated: Are characterized as nonapprehended and nondual.

original: shin tu med dang de bzhin med //
analyzed: shin tu med dang de bzhin med //
translated: They are utterly nonexistent and nonexistent in that way,

original: de dngos med pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de dngos med pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Having the nature of the nonexistence of that.🔽Through the power of a mantra,

original: sngags mthus sgyu ma byas pa yis //
analyzed: sngags mthus sgyu ma byas pa yis //
translated: An illusion is created

original: ji nas glang po snang gyur pa //
analyzed: ji nas glang po snang gyur pa //
translated: In which an elephant appears.

original: rnam pa tsam zhig snang bar 'dod //
analyzed: rnam pa tsam zhig snang bar 'dod //
translated: It is asserted that only the aspect appears,

original: glang po kun du yod ma yin //
analyzed: glang po kun du yod ma yin //
translated: But the elephant does not exist at all.

original: brtags pa'i rang bzhin glang po 'dra //
analyzed: brtags pa'i rang bzhin glang po 'dra //
translated: The imagined is like the elephant.

original: gzhan dbang de'i rnam lta bu'o //
analyzed: gzhan dbang de'i rnam lta bu'o //
translated: The dependent is like the aspect of that.🔽The consummate is like

original: de la glang po dngos med gang //🔽de 'dra yongs su grub par 'dod //
analyzed: de la glang po dngos med gang // de 'dra yongs su grub par 'dod //
translated: The nonexistence of the elephant in that.

original: rtsa ba'i sems las gnyis bdag tu //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sems las gnyis bdag tu //
translated: The root mind is like the mantra.

original: yang dag ma yin kun rtog snang //
analyzed: yang dag ma yin kun rtog snang //
translated: False imagination appears.

original: gnyis po shin tu med pas na //
analyzed: gnyis po shin tu med pas na //
translated: Since the two do not exist at all,

original: de ni rnam pa tsam du yod //
analyzed: de ni rnam pa tsam du yod //
translated: it exists as mere representation.

original: rtsa ba'i rnam shes sngags dang 'dra //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rnam shes sngags dang 'dra //
translated: The root consciousness is like a spell,

original: de bzhin nyid ni shing 'drar 'dod //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni shing 'drar 'dod //
translated: suchness is like a tree,

original: rnam rtog glang po'i rnam pa 'dra //
analyzed: rnam rtog glang po'i rnam pa 'dra //
translated: and imagination is like an elephant.

original: gnyis ni glang po lta bu'o //
analyzed: gnyis ni glang po lta bu'o //
translated: The two are like the elephant.

original: don gyi de nyid rig pa na //🔽yongs su shes dang spang ba dang // thob bya go rims ji bzhin du //
analyzed: don gyi de nyid rig pa na // yongs su shes dang spang ba dang // thob bya go rims ji bzhin du //
translated: When the reality of the object is known,

original: cig car mtshan nyid gsum rig byed //
analyzed: cig car mtshan nyid gsum rig byed //
translated: the three characteristics are simultaneously known,🔽respectively as the object to be known, abandoned, and obtained.🔽The object to be known is the absence of the object.

original: dmigs su med pa yong shes dang // snang ba dag ni spong bar 'dod //🔽gnyis su med pas dmigs pas na //
analyzed: dmigs su med pa yong shes dang // snang ba dag ni spong bar 'dod // gnyis su med pas dmigs pas na //
translated: The object to be abandoned is the appearance of the object.🔽The object to be obtained is the nonapprehension of the two.

original: thob bya mngon du byas pa'ang yin //
analyzed: thob bya mngon du byas pa'ang yin //
translated: The object to be obtained is the realization of nonduality.

original: glang po dmigs su med pas na //
analyzed: glang po dmigs su med pas na //
translated: When the elephant is not apprehended,

original: de yi rnam pa nub 'gyur te //
analyzed: de yi rnam pa nub 'gyur te //
translated: its image disappears.

original: shing gi dum bu dmigs 'gyur ba //
analyzed: shing gi dum bu dmigs 'gyur ba //
translated: When a piece of wood is apprehended,

original: sgyu ma la ni ji bzhin du //
analyzed: sgyu ma la ni ji bzhin du //
translated: it is like an illusion.

original: 'di ltar gnyis po mi dmigs tshe //
analyzed: 'di ltar gnyis po mi dmigs tshe //
translated: When the two are not apprehended,

original: gnyis su snang ba nub par 'gyur //
analyzed: gnyis su snang ba nub par 'gyur //
translated: the appearance of the two disappears.

original: nub na de yi yongs grub pa //
analyzed: nub na de yi yongs grub pa //
translated: In the west, the perfect nature.

original: gnyis dngos @11b mid pa rtog par 'gyur //
analyzed: gnyis dngos @11b mid pa rtog par 'gyur //
translated: The two things are the conceptualization of the mind.🔽Because of the influence of discordant ideas,🔽because of the mind seeing what is not there,🔽because of following the three kinds of wisdom,

original: mi mthun blo yi dbang sgyur dang // don med bzhin du blos mthong dang // ye shes gsum ga'i rjes 'brang dang // 'bad med grol bar thal 'gyur phyir //
analyzed: mi mthun blo yi dbang sgyur dang // don med bzhin du blos mthong dang // ye shes gsum ga'i rjes 'brang dang // 'bad med grol bar thal 'gyur phyir //
translated: and because of the consequence that there would be effortless liberation,

original: sems tsam du ni nyer dmigs te //
analyzed: sems tsam du ni nyer dmigs te //
translated: One should focus on the mind only.

original: shes bya'i don la dmigs mi bya //
analyzed: shes bya'i don la dmigs mi bya //
translated: One should not focus on the object of knowledge.

original: shes bya'i don ni dmigs med pas //
analyzed: shes bya'i don ni dmigs med pas //
translated: Because the object of knowledge is not focused on,

original: sems kyang dmigs su med pa yin //
analyzed: sems kyang dmigs su med pa yin //
translated: The mind also is not focused on.

original: gnyis po dmigs su med pas na //🔽chos kyi dbyings la dmigs par 'gyur //
analyzed: gnyis po dmigs su med pas na // chos kyi dbyings la dmigs par 'gyur //
translated: Because the two are not focused on,🔽One focuses on the dharmadhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pa yis //🔽phun sum tshogs pa nyer dmigs 'gyur //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pa yis // phun sum tshogs pa nyer dmigs 'gyur //
translated: By focusing on the dharmadhātu,🔽One focuses on the perfect.🔽By focusing on the perfect,

original: phun sum tshogs pa nyer dmigs pas //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa nyer dmigs pas //
translated: The wise attain the unsurpassed enlightenment

original: sku gsum bdag nyid bla med pa'i //🔽byang chub blo ldan gyis thob nas //
analyzed: sku gsum bdag nyid bla med pa'i // byang chub blo ldan gyis thob nas //
translated: That is the nature of the three bodies,

original: bdag gzhan don ni rab grub 'gyur //
analyzed: bdag gzhan don ni rab grub 'gyur //
translated: And they perfectly accomplish the welfare of self and other.

original: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i rang bzhin gsum nges par bstan pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i rang bzhin gsum nges par bstan pa rdzogs so /
translated: The teaching of the ascertainment of the three natures composed by the master Vasubandhu is complete.

original: // / pandi ta chen po sh'an ti bha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis gtan la phab ste legs par bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / pandi ta chen po sh'an ti bha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis gtan la phab ste legs par bsgyur ba'o//
translated: It was translated and finalized by the great pandit Santibhadra and the great editor-translator, the monk Lotsawa Go of Zhung.
